phrases.phrase: [KL] Editor Manager - Update Google Font List
The special characters button is not enabled in the general editor options. Any changes you make here won't be visible for your users until you activate it.
Applies basic formatting to the wrapped text.
Applies advanced formatting to the wrapped text.
[LEFT]Left-aligned[/LEFT] [CENTER]Center-aligned[/CENTER] [RIGHT]Right-aligned[/RIGHT] [JUSTIFY]This is a justified text block with a long content to demonstrate the justification.[/JUSTIFY]
Displays an audio player, using the wrapped text as URL.
This is text with [BGCOLOR=#ffaaaa]red[/BGCOLOR] and [BGCOLOR=#aaaaff]blue[/BGCOLOR] background.

Hide content from users depending on various circumstances. [HIDEREPLY] - Hides content until user has replied to the subject. [HIDETHANKS] - Hides content until user has liked the content. [HIDEREPLYTHANKS] - Hides content until user has replied to the subject or liked the content. [HIDEPOSTS] - Hides content until user has a certain number of posts. [HIDE] - Works like {hide}.

[HIDE]You can view this content.[/HIDE] [HIDEREPLY]You can view this content.[/HIDEREPLY] [HIDETHANKS]You can view this content.[/HIDETHANKS] [HIDEREPLYTHANKS]You can view this content.[/HIDEREPLYTHANKS] [HIDEPOSTS]You can view this content.[/HIDEPOSTS]
This is a [ISPOILER]Simple spoiler[/ISPOILER]. This is a [ISPOILER=Spoiler]with a title[/ISPOILER].
Changes vertical align of table cells and table header cells.
Changes the appearance of tables depending on the classes chosen. Multiple classes can be used, separated by a space.

[TABLE=nofullwidth] [TR][TD]A table that is not full width[/TD][/TR][/TABLE]
[TABLE=center-nofullwidth] [TR][TD]A centered table.[/TD][/TR][/TABLE]
[TABLE=right-nofullwidth] [TR][TD]A right aligned table.[/TD][/TR][/TABLE]
[TABLE=noborder] [TR][TD]A table with no border.[/TD][/TR][/TABLE]
[TABLE=nobackground] [TR][TD]A table that[/TD][/TR][TR][TD]doesn't color rows differently[/TD][/TR][/TABLE]
[TABLE=collapse] [TR][TD]A table that[/TD][TD] has non-equal width columns.[/TD][/TR][/TABLE]
Use [TR] tags to start new rows inside a table tag. Use [TD] tags to start new cells inside row tags. Use [TH] to start new table header cells inside table rows.
Displays a video, using the wrapped text as the URL.
Your browser does not support the audio element.
Your browser does not support the video tag.

Clientside fonts are fonts, that are already available on your users devices. The advantage is clearly, that they do not need to be downloaded to the device, when the page is loaded. However, this brings a severe disadvantage: If a user does not already have the font, it cannot be rendered for him. If none of the fonts in the font stack is available to him, his system will use the default font instead. It is recommended to carefully consider the font collection before chosing this option.

If whitelist mode is enabled, this is a list of all fonts that can be used by your users via font polling. If blacklist mode is enabled instead, this is a list of all fonts that cannot be used. Separate multiple entries with line breaks.

If enabled, users with the required permission can use Google Fonts as they wish, which will be loaded when required. This differs from integrated Google Fonts which will be loaded on all XenForo-driven pages.
Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs.
Number of posts for post hide
Invalid font file selected. Either the file has been deleted from the server or no file has been selected.
The URL is invalid. Please ensure to select the right hosting service and ensure that the URL does look like depicted in the example.
Keep text format on character deletion

This page allows you to define the order of buttons, that are shown in your editor toolbar. You may remove any button from any of the four toolbars by dragging it out of the toolbar. You can also add new buttons from the bar above, which holds a list of all available buttons, by dragging them to where you want to have them.

You are using a lot of fonts, that are either hosted from your server or external services. This will slow down your page and will have a negative impact on your user experience. You should consider to reduce the number of fonts you host from external sources.
You need {needs} more posts to view this content.
There are no public editor templates yet.
You are not allowed to view this content.
This option is visible in debug mode only.
Please upload a valid XML file.
Use this option to import an XML file containing special character definitions.
Use this option to import from one of the pre-defined libraries.

Serverside fonts are hosted directly from your server. You will have to manually upload these fonts to the data/fonts/-directory inside your XenForo installation. Supported file types are woff2, woff, ttf, otf, eot & svg. It is recommended, to provide a woff2 file. Your uploaded files will be matched into a set by the system and will be listed below. Ensure, that they all share the same name in order to have them listed in a single group. You will have to resave the font, if you decide to upload additional file types later on. The filename will match the font family.

External fonts are fonts, that are neither already on your clients device nor hosted on your own server. They are resources, that are located somewhere else on the web. The main advantages of using these fonts are the large choice of available fonts from different hosters, the bandwidth you save by not having to provide them to the users yourself and the likelyhood of those fonts already being in the cache of your users from a different website they visited before.

In the following you find a list of font stacks, that are so widely spread, that the likelyhood of one of your users not having the font is very low. Due to this circumstance, they're considered to be web safe - safe to be used on your website.
You need to like or reply to this in order to see this content.
You need to like this in order to view this content.
You need to reply to this in order to see this content.
Audio and video proxy log length
Log audio and video proxy referrers for x days:

If a value greater than 0 is entered, images cached by the video proxy will be refreshed after this many days have passed. This can be used in conjunction with a long cache lifetime to allow videos to be updated periodically while retaining resilience against the video being removed. If a value of 0 is entered, videos will only be updated when the cache entry expires.

If a value greater than 0 is entered, audios cached by the audio proxy will be refreshed after this many days have passed. This can be used in conjunction with a long cache lifetime to allow audios to be updated periodically while retaining resilience against the audio being removed. If a value of 0 is entered, audios will only be updated when the cache entry expires.

Enter the number of days that proxied audios should be retained for, before they are removed from your system. If the audio is re-requested after this time, it will automatically be fetched again. Use 0 to retain the audios indefinitely.
This is the maximum file size for audios that are displayed through the audio proxy system. An audio larger than this will return a placeholder audio instead. You may use 0 to disable the limit.
The number of colors per row in the editor color select dropdown.
The set of available colors to pick from using the color picker dropdown. To remove a color, leave the value empty. The REMOVE button will automatically be added to the end of the list.
The hide-version the default [hide] code will act like.

If enabled, users that have been granted the permission will be able to utilize the whole Google Fonts library in their BB code content, no matter if they have been integrated into your web page or not. If they're not already included, they will be loaded on demand.
Available sizes in the editor font size dropdown, separated by comma.

If you enter a Google Font API key here, your board will be able to automatically update the google fonts list by itself once a week and provider your users with suggestions when they search for a google font in the BB Code editor.
If enabled, will show a hex color code input, allowing users to chose their own text color.

This is an advanced option. It is recommended to only edit it if you know exactly what you're doing. Adding controllers here will not make the hide BB code magically work on non-forum routes, but allows you to add additional controllers from 3rd party add-ons that add functionality to threads where the hide Bb code will not be hidden. One entry per line.
When enabled, the image Bb Code will support optional parameters that allows people to align the images they include into their posts manually.
When enabled, the image Bb Code will support optional parameters that allows people to resize the images they include into their posts manually.
If enabled, a placeholder will be shown and the editor will only load, if the user clicks into the placeholder area. This will speed up page load.
The editor toolbar layout. It is recommended to edit this option from here.
The maximum font size that can be specified (in pixel). 0 for no limit.
The minimum font size that can be specified (in pixel).

By enabling these options, you may proxy and cache videos and audios posted in messages through your own server, allowing tracking of clicks etc. This is especially important if you are running your site through SSL (HTTPS).

This option controls the length of time for which the proxy logs will be maintained after the last request made to an audio or a video. If an entry is not requested for this amount of time, its data (including first request time and total accesses) will be removed. Proxy logs will never be removed unless the audio or video data has been removed (Audio/video cache lifetime). Use 0 to disable pruning of the logs.

If enabled, whenever a proxied audio or video is accessed, referrer information will be maintained. This can be viewed in the logs to determine where the audio or video has been mentioned. Use 0 to keep the referrer data forever.

Enter the number of days that proxied videos should be retained for, before they are removed from your system. If the video is re-requested after this time, it will automatically be fetched again. Use 0 to retain the videos indefinitely.
This is the maximum file size for videos that are displayed through the image proxy system. A video larger than this will return a placeholder video instead. You may use 0 to disable the limit.
Options centered around the Froala Editor and the BB code engine.

Special styling rules for the hide BB codes ([HIDE], [HIDEREPLY], [HIDETHANKS], [HIDEREPLYTHANKS], [HIDEPOSTS]) content in shown state.
